languages.text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.
languages.original_text:
Цель не прекращает гореть и больше не совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} для снятия эффекта.
Если это союзная цель, то при каждой атаке в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} она наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный урону от горения, а для нее самой получаемый от {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} урон сокращается вдвое.

traits.locale_text:
The target does not stop burning and no longer makes tests to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every melee attack of that ally inflicts full burning damage on the targets of the attack, while they themselves now only suffer half of the burning damage from now on.

The target does not stop burning and no longer makes tests to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every melee attack that ally makes inflicts full burning damage on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.

Цель не прекращает гореть и больше не совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} для снятия эффекта.
Если это союзная цель, то при каждой атаке в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} она наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный урону от горения, а для нее самой получаемый от {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} урон сокращается вдвое.
languages.original_text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.

traits.locale_text:
Цель не прекращает гореть и больше не совершает проверки для снятия эффекта.
Если это союзная цель, то при каждой атаке в ближнем бою она наносит урон, равный урону от горения, а для нее самой получаемый от горения урон сокращается вдвое.

Цель не прекращает гореть и больше не совершает проверки для снятия эффекта.
Если это союзная цель, то при каждой атаке в ближнем бою она наносит урон, равный урону от горения, а для нее самой получаемый от горения урон сокращается вдвое.

languages.text:
所有目标的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果不会再停止，目标也无法再通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}来扑灭火焰。
此外，如果燃烧的目标是盟友，则该盟友只承受一半的燃烧{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，而且该盟友每次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}都会对攻击目标额外造成全额灼烧伤害。
languages.original_text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.

traits.locale_text:
所有目标的燃烧效果不会再停止，目标也无法再通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}来扑灭火焰。
此外，如果燃烧的目标是盟友，则该盟友只承受一半的燃烧伤害，而且该盟友每次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}都会对攻击目标额外造成全额灼烧伤害。

languages.text:
El objetivo no deja de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}arder{/g} y ya no puede realizar más {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} para dejar de arder.
Además, si el objetivo es un aliado, todo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que realice inflige el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} completo por estar ardiendo a los objetivos de dicho ataque, mientras que él pasa a sufrir únicamente la mitad del daño por estar ardiendo.
languages.original_text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.

traits.locale_text:
El objetivo no deja de arder y ya no puede realizar más {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} para dejar de arder.
Además, si el objetivo es un aliado, todo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que realice inflige el daño completo por estar ardiendo a los objetivos de dicho ataque, mientras que él pasa a sufrir únicamente la mitad del daño por estar ardiendo.

languages.text:
Das Ziel hört nicht auf zu {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennen{/g} und macht keine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} mehr, um den Brand zu beenden.
Außerdem, wenn es sich bei dem Ziel um einen Verbündeten handelt, fügt jeder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} dieses Verbündeten dem Ziel seines Angriffs vollen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Verbrennungsschaden{/g} zu, während er selbst von nun an nur noch halben Verbrennungsschaden erleidet.
languages.original_text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.

traits.locale_text:
Das Ziel hört nicht auf zu brennen und macht keine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} mehr, um den Brand zu beenden.
Außerdem, wenn es sich bei dem Ziel um einen Verbündeten handelt, fügt jeder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} dieses Verbündeten dem Ziel seines Angriffs vollen Verbrennungsschaden zu, während er selbst von nun an nur noch halben Verbrennungsschaden erleidet.

languages.text:
La cible ne s'arrête pas de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brûler{/g} et ne passe plus de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} pour cesser de se consumer.
En outre, si cette cible est un allié, chacune de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} inflige le maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de combustion à ses cibles, alors que lui-même n'en subit plus que la moitié.
languages.original_text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.

traits.locale_text:
La cible ne s'arrête pas de brûler et ne passe plus de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} pour cesser de se consumer.
En outre, si cette cible est un allié, chacune de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} inflige le maximum de dégâts de combustion à ses cibles, alors que lui-même n'en subit plus que la moitié.

languages.text:
ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を止めることができず、そのための{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}も行えなくなる。
さらに、ターゲットが味方である場合、その味方が行う{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}はすべて、その攻撃のターゲットにすべての炎上{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、自身が受ける炎上ダメージは半分になる。
languages.original_text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.

traits.locale_text:
ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を止めることができず、そのための{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}も行えなくなる。
さらに、ターゲットが味方である場合、その味方が行う{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}はすべて、その攻撃のターゲットにすべての炎上{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、自身が受ける炎上ダメージは半分になる。

languages.text:
Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanması{/g} durmaz ve artık yanmayı durdurmak için {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} yapamaz.
Ayrıca hedef bir dost birimse yaptığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırıları{/g}, hedefine tam yanma {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} verirken kendisiyse artık yalnızca yarı miktarda yanma hasarına maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:
The target does not stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and no longer makes {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} to stop burning.
Additionally, if the target is an ally, every {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that ally makes inflicts full burning {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on targets of their attack, while they themselves now only suffer half burning damage from now on.
